DOC.brief_summary: This study measure nonheme iron absorption 7 daily MyPyramid menu . Such measurement confirm whether modification need meet dietary iron recommendation provide data useful validation algorithm calculate dietary iron bioavailability .
DOC.detailed_description: Nonheme iron absorption measure 59Fe tracer add 1-day menu , iron retention detect two week later whole body scintillation counter . Each subject iron absorption measure 7 1-d menu formulate meet US dietary guideline ( MyPyramid menu ) , order menu randomly assign . Each subject participate 14 wk test 7 menu .
DOC.criteria: Women 21 50 year old Anemia , High blood pressure , Disorders affect iron absorption retention , Underlying medical condition , Taking medication birth control pills hormone replacement therapy , Pregnancy , Daily use analgesic
